text: Rolim de Moura Esporte Clube, commonly known as Rolim de Moura, is a Brazilian football club based in Rolim de Moura, Rondônia state. ==History== The club was founded on November 1, 2002. They finished in the second position in the Campeonato Rondoniense Second Level in 2007. ==Stadium== Rolim de Moura Esporte Clube play their home games at Estádio José Ângelo Cassol, nicknamed Cassolão. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 5,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 2002 Category:Football clubs in Rondônia Category:2002 establishments in Brazil
title: Rolim de Moura Esporte Clube
